page_content: Anleitung für Benutzung des ÖREB-Katasters in ZugMap.ch, including instructions on how to generate and save an ÖREB excerpt as a PDF file.
Announcement of 1.5 million Swiss Francs available for building renovations in the Canton of Zug for 2019, with details on the program and how to apply for funding.

Summary of the annual financial report for the Canton of Zug for 2022, highlighting a record surplus and detailing various financial aspects, including a mention of a software-related correction in tax accounting.

Overview of the Operation department responsible for IT infrastructure in the Canton of Zug, including details on application management, IT infrastructure management, network, communication, security, and their commitment to quality IT services.

Instructions on how to submit electronic applications and documents to the Handelsregisteramt, including requirements for a qualified electronic signature and the use of specific software for signature validation.

Description of the financial administration in the Canton of Zug, including responsibilities for accounting, budgeting, financial reporting, liquidity management, and providing support for financial software.

Information about the status of 5G mobile technology in the Canton of Zug, including details on the new transmission protocol, modern software, frequency usage, and the regulatory process for expanding antenna infrastructure.

Information about the official inspection process for consumer safety in the food and consumer goods sector in the Canton of Zug, including details on controls, hygiene, food waste, labeling, and guidelines for handling food.

Information about the agricultural land law in the Canton of Zug, focusing on promoting family farms, regulating the acquisition and sale of agricultural land, and combating excessive prices for agricultural land.
